select:
(:action select_body_part ; select a body part of the character
    :parameters (?p - player ?part - body_part)
    :precondition (and (at ?p cantina) (part_unselected ?part))
    :effect (and (part_selected ?part) (not (part_unselected ?part)))
)

(:action choose_specific_part ; choose a specific part for the selected body part
    :parameters (?p - player ?part - body_part ?specific_part - specific_part)
    :precondition (and (at ?p cantina) (part_selected ?part) (specific_part_available ?specific_part))
    :effect (and (part_chosen ?part ?specific_part) (not (part_selected ?part)))
)

(:action save_and_exit ; save the character and exit
    :parameters (?p - player)
    :precondition (and (at ?p cantina) (character_named ?name))
    :effect (and (character_saved ?name) (not (at ?p cantina)) (at ?p main_menu))
)
name:
(:action name_character ; name the character
    :parameters (?p - player ?name - string)
    :precondition (and (at ?p cantina) (character_nameless))
    :effect (and (character_named ?name) (not (character_nameless)))
)
enter:
(:action enter_free_play ; enter a completed level and turn on free play
    :parameters (?p - player ?level - level)
    :precondition (and (at ?p main_menu) (level_completed ?level))
    :effect (and (in_free_play ?p ?level) (not (at ?p main_menu)))
)
```

Explanation:
- `select_body_part`: This action allows the player to select a body part of the character.
- `choose_specific_part`: This action allows the player to choose a specific part for the selected body part.
- `name_character`: This action allows the player to name the character.
- `save_and_exit`: This action allows the player to save the character and exit the character creation screen.
- `enter_free_play`: This action allows the player to enter a completed level and turn on free play.
